biotools.summary: Coral is a web-based visual analysis tool for creating and characterizing cohorts. Users can interactively create and refine cohorts, which can then be compared, characterized, and inspected down to the level of single items. Coral visualizes the evolution of cohorts and also provides intuitive access to prevalence information.
